content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Hello! Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. What rental price are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can you give me an offer?
name: Hassan Rahman

content: I understand. Based on the location and size of the apartment, I am willing to offer a rental price of 400 Euros per month. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
It's a bit high. Can you lower the price?

I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: I understand. Based on your budget, I am willing to accept the rental price of 350 Euros per month. Thank you for your interest in my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
